promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young strong serpent steel-type pokemon with a ancient tail. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Serpentain, a a chibi young strong serpent steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Slicing Blade, Assembly-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "steel" or "Serpentain". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, serpent-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: Hardened-scales Pokémon, Serpentain thrives in cragged zones, its Blade Slicing & Assembly-GX skills make it unbeatable. Child-like yet robust!
